name: Shape it Up!
description:
Have some time to spare and want to have a simple, fast and fun experience? Shape it Up! gives you the chance to do just that.

In this minimalist game, you have to spin multiple shapes so that they only hit other shapes which are similar to them.

Your goal is to make as many points as you can while ensuring that every shape you control only hits the correct shape. How many shapes can you control at the same time?
